review-text: I almost didnâ€™t buy this phone because of some reviews claiming it arrived locked. Iâ€™m extremely glad I went ahead with the purchase â€” this was one of the best Amazon Renewed experiences Iâ€™ve had. First, the phone itself is excellent quality. It looks brand new, not refurbished. No scratches, no signs of wear, strong battery life, and smooth performance right out of the box. Now, about the unlocking complaints â€” especially important to clarify: This phone was sent to Asia, and it was still very easily unlocked by simply following the clear directions included in the box. The paperwork inside explicitly states that you do not need to pay extra to unlock the phone and that if the device arrives locked, you should contact the company directly. I did exactly that. Their customer service was beyond helpful â€” quick response, simple instructions, and the phone was unlocked very fast with zero hassle. The process was straightforward and worked exactly as promised, even for international use. After going through this myself, itâ€™s clear that many of the negative reviews come from people who: â€¢ Didnâ€™t read the papers included in the box â€¢ Didnâ€™t contact the seller â€¢ Or assumed the phone was permanently locked without following the provided steps If you follow the directions they give you, the process is quick, easy, and stress-free. This company clearly stands behind their product. The phone quality is outstanding, and their customer service is truly top-tier â€” especially impressive given that this was handled across regions. span: Great phone - Android for the win
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2026
a-link-normal: Color: Silver ShadowMemory Storage Capacity: 128 GB
review-text: Excellent phone, works great. I like it much better than the iPhone I used to have haha. And great size too - fits decently in my women's pants pockets, and not too big of a screen to work with (I used to have the iPhone 13 mini). Good cameras, speakers, battery life, flash light. I like the adaptive screen brightness, oled display - nice on my eyes at night. It's fun to play with all the customizable features it has - check out the Good Lock app, it has even more customization fun.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2026
review-text: Ordered for my son, 14 yr old. It was in great shape, easy to setup with the included instructions & a bit cheaper than brand new. Phone works great, wouldn't know that it is not new.

span: Easily activates on Verizon with an eSIM
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2025
review-text: Nice phone.  Like new.  Unlocked, but Verizon doesn't seems to play well with their own SIM. After hours of fighting with their website and app trying to activate the phone on am existing line, I removed the SIM from the phone and used the app to download an eSIM. After that the phone immediately activated and has been working flawlessly since. My advice to others experiencing trouble activating unlocked phones on Verizon? Ditch the plastic SIM and download an eSIM using the Verizon app.  As always, YMMV.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2026
review-text: I got a s25 unlocked.everything went good and phone was in great condition

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2026
a-link-normal: Color: Silver ShadowMemory Storage Capacity: 128 GB
review-text: It took a day or two to get used to it since I've been devoted to Pixel for so long but it was definitely a good purchase. Even the setup, including transferring files and my phone number was very easy. I wasn't used to this because, in the past, I had to call my phone company to issue a new e-Sim. Five stars!!!!

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2026
review-text: I could find one little tiny nic on the side edge of my new (refurbished) phone. Otherwise, it looks brand new, but MUCH cheaper!!! Just finished setting it up, with the assistance of my network provider. It was simple and worked seamlessly.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2026
a-link-normal: Color: Silver ShadowMemory Storage Capacity: 256 GB
review-text: I switched over from iPhone after about 8 years, and I adore this phone. The transfer from each software was super easy, they have a whole setup for it. The size is perfect, it isn't too bulky at all, the camera and graphics quality are a huge upgrade, and the battery lasts all day.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2026
review-text: Seems to be a great phone. It was delivered on time and undamaged. Phone itself was in excellent condition and all contents promised were there. It was unlocked and ready to go right out of the shipping package (of course after putting a SIM card in from my older device). Highly recommend this seller.
